name: World Summit and Expo on Food Science and Technology
content: Dear Colleagues It is a great pleasure for us to invite all scientists, academicians, scholars, students and medical entrepreneurs at the World Summit and Expo on Food Science and Technology (WSEFST2024), which will be held in London, UK during April 22-24, 2024\. The objective of WSEFST2024 is to provide a unique forum for discussion of the novel developments, refresh your knowledge and will offer plenty of networking opportunities, providing you a chance to meet and interact with leading researchers as well as most influential minds in the field of food science and technology. The conference with major scientific themes of Food Science and Technology, Food Chemistry, Food and Nutritional Toxicology, Food Microbiology, Food Safety and Regulatory Science, Food & Public Health Nutrition, Food for Improving Immunity, Food Engineering and Processing, Nutritional Deficiency and Disorders and Current Trends in Food Technology etc., will be discussed at all length scales. We believe all researchers and entrepreneurs in the field will create huge opportunities by showcasing the growth and breakthrough of food science and technology at a time when so many new innovations and challenges are available. Finally, we hope and trust that you will find the conference and your visit to the very beautiful and exciting city of UK, in April 2024 both valuable and enjoyable!
